title: New Website
content:
Our new website is up -

[http://www.vanlieuphotography.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015061258/http:/www.vanlieuphotography.com/ "http://www.vanlieuphotography.com")

The old/new journal site is now here -

[http://www.photographinganisland.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015061258/http:/www.photographinganisland.com/ "http://www.photographinganisland.com")
author: Sharon Van Lieu

comments.content:
Lookin good, Sharon! Your photos are spectacular as usual, too!

ChrisL

Thank you, Chris. You are too kind.

Sharon

Nice site and, like Chris said, the photos are spectacular. What camera(s)do you use?

António

Thanks, Antonio. I use a lowly Nikon D70 camera with the wonderful Nikon 17-35mm lens for most part. I want to upgrade to the D700 soon. (fingers crossed)

Thanks for looking and commenting. I really appreciate it.

Sharon
We also have one of the big Nikon digitals that we use. :-)

I made some changes. Dropped one category and changed the title of another. Thanks for all the help I've gotten from Typophiles and LinkedIn folks!

Sharon
